Home → New in and suggestions → Staff Picks → Advent calendar 2016

Suffolk Libraries advent calendar 2016

Every day until Christmas Eve a member of Suffolk Libraries reveals a book, album or film they'll be giving as a Christmas present, and why.

December 1

The Secret Diary of Hendrik Groen, 83 ¼, by Anonymous.

Stock team member Jo Dixon recommends The Secret Diary of Hendrik Groen, 83 ¼, by an anonymous Dutch author.

December 2

The Dinosaur That Pooped Christmas, by Tom Fletcher, Dougie Poynter & Garry Parsons

Library and information advisor Emma Maguire recommends The Dinosaur That Pooped Christmas, by Tom Fletcher, Dougie Poynter & Garry Parsons.

December 3

Ten Little Elves, by Michael Brownlow & Simon Rickerty.

Kedington Library manager Dawn Bamford recommends Ten Little Elves, by Michael Brownlow & Simon Rickerty.

December 4

Elf

Elmswell Library manager Emma Yarrow recommends the film Elf.

December 5

Room

Library and information advisor Nilima Banerji recommends the film Room
